◆ kStoreBufferSize

const int v8::internal::StoreBuffer::kStoreBufferSize
static
Initial value:
=
Max(static_cast<int>(kMinExpectedOSPageSize / kStoreBuffers),
1 << (11 + kPointerSizeLog2))
